answerText: Karl Weierstrass[10] The terms in a sequence with this mathematician's namesake type of completeness get arbitrarily close together. This French mathematician names an inequality on vector spaces with Schwarz, as well as a residue theorem.
heading: SUBMIT |2014 | Illinois A, Alabama, Yale B | 21 | Science | Math | College
subject: Science
question: Question:  [10] Name this German mathematician, the second namesake of a theorem which states that every bounded sequence in Rn must possess a convergent subsequence.
